import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { CButton, CModal, CModalBody, CModalFooter, CModalHeader, CModalTitle } from '@coreui/react'; class OrderDetail extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); const {order} = props; this.state = { id: order ? order._id : '', total_price: order ? order.total_price: '', order_list: order ? order.order_list : [] } } onChange = (event) =>{ var target=event.target; var name=target.name; var value=target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { const {total_price, order_list, createdAt, status, payment_method, confirm, is_paid} = this.state; const { large, onClose, order} = this.props; return ( onClose(!large)} size="lg"> {order ? "Sửa thông tin sản phẩm" : "Thêm sản phẩm mới"}
{payment_method==="local" ? <>
: <>
}
{order_list.map((item, index) =>{ return (

{item.name}

{item.price} VND x {item.quantity}

) }) }
this.onSubmit(!large)}> Save {' '} onClose(!large)}> Cancel ); } } export default OrderDetail;
